content:
My life back then wasn't busy at all.
When you were all asleep, I was outside,
When you woke up, I was getting ready for rest.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I just have more free time,
Unlike you all.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Lately, I've been trying to sleep at night and wake up in the morning,
Going to the morning market in the neighborhood, just like always.
But somehow...{短暂停}something feels different.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Especially after brewing coffee in the evening,
I seem to find extra time for walks.
I suppose this is what they call "leisure"?
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Ah, let me put it this way.
A morning marks the beginning of a day.
A morning marks the end of a day.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Thanks to you,
I was fortunate enough to live
by different rules for a while.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I'm planning out my new schedule,
cutting back on evening work hours,
and adding more daytime activities.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Oh, delving into patterns without fundamental change
Won't help me match your pace.
<color=#695c3a>But at least, I'm getting closer.</color>
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
...Oh, I was just thinking,
we could chat a bit
about your new life.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I recently moved to a new place,
Getting fewer requests than before,
It's disrupting my usual routine.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊
闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
But what's there to talk about life?
Let me think about it, we'll chat next time.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Oh, it's not bad at all.
I just don't quite understand what else I could do,
I should think it through.
